General.Name: Oriole Resources PLC
General.Description: Oriole Resources PLC, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the exploration and development of gold and other base metals in Turkey, East Africa, and West Africa. The company was formerly known as Stratex International Plc and changed its name to Oriole Resources PLC in September 2018. Oriole Resources PLC was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Eastleigh, the United Kingdom.

2.Name: Ms. Claire Jenna-Louise Bay
